title: Broken or self mistake
body: I tried to log into league today and it was working saying it was broken and needed to be fixed and I knew Riot was on it right away..... 9 hours later it still wasn't fix for me so i decided to uninstall and reinstall since  my friends were able to play the game. I thought that wold fix it .... WRONG.. it only made it worse and now it wont even launch saying the PVP.net kernal patcher broke... so if anyone at riot or just another player has found a fix I will be glad to hear it.

replies.body: Typically that Kernel Error is a sign that League doesn't have all of the right admin settings to make sure that it has access to all the files it needs. Double check that you've got all the correct [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) in place, and let me know if that helps.
